items.name: Palong Shaker Ghonto
items.description: A Bengali dish made with spinach (palong shak) cooked with a variety of vegetables and dried lentil dumplings, lightly spiced for a nutritious and comforting meal.
items.extra: Make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Cholar Dal Murgi Diye
items.description: A Bengali dish where tender pieces of chicken (murgi) are cooked with cholar dal (Bengal gram or split chickpeas) in a mildly spiced, rich gravy making a hearty and flavorful dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kolkata Kathi Roll
items.description: Famous street food of Kolkata. Flaky wholewheat flatbread pan cooked and stuffed with egg omlette, spices, picked onions and cucumber made into a roll.

items.name: Bengali Pulao
items.description: A fragrant rice dish made with basmati rice, ghee, and whole spices like cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, vegetables and dried fruits, giving it a subtle sweetness and rich flavor.

items.name: Hyderabadi  Veg Nizami Handi
items.description: A rich and creamy Mughlai dish featuring a mix of vegetables or meat cooked in a flavorful gravy made with yogurt, cream, and spices. It is slow-cooked to enhance its aromatic flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Nizami Dum ka Murg
items.description: A traditional Hyderabadi dish made with marinated chicken slow-cooked (dum) in a rich and aromatic gravy of yogurt, cream, and spices. The slow-cooking process enhances the flavors, making the chicken tender and infused with the royal Nizami essence.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Shikampuri Kebab
items.description: A traditional Hyderabadi kebab made from ground chicken mixed with spices and stuffed with a creamy filling of yogurt and finely chopped onions or herbs. These soft, melt-in-the-mouth kebabs are then shallow-fried (5 kebab)

items.name: Chicken Keema Paratha
items.description: A stuffed flatbread where spiced minced chicken (kheema) is filled inside dough and rolled out into a paratha. It is cooked on a griddle with ghee or oil, resulting in a crispy, flavorful dish

items.name: Paneer Tikka Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that combines the succulent and marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) with fragrant basmati rice, spices, and herbs. It is a delicious fusion of Indian flavors, perfect for biryani lovers and vegetarians. Served with raita and papad

items.name: Crispy Chicken Lollipop Biryani
items.description: A fusion dish combining the flavors of classic biryani with crispy fried chicken lollipops. The biryani is made with fragrant basmati rice cooked with aromatic spices, while the crispy chicken lollipops add a crunchy and flavorful twist, making it an indulgent, satisfying meal. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Potato patty fried and served with spicy and flavourful chickpea gravy topped with sweet and tangy tamrind sauce and spicy green chutney, onion, pomagrante seeds, fresh coriander, sev and chaat masala. A lip smacking snack found on the streets of India. (2 patties)

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with whole spices and teamed with fragant basmati rice, caramalised onion and cashew nuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Chettinad Kaigari Mandi
items.description: A flavourful South Indian Vegetarian dish made of veggies in a base of Chettinad spice mix.  Kaigari in Tamil language means vegetables, Mandi loosely refers to a medley of veggie and dal curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad

items.name: Kari Kuzhambu
items.description: A rich and spicy South Indian curry made with tender pieces of mutton simmered in a blend of aromatic Chettinad spices, tamarind, and coconut. Known for its deep, complex flavors, it’s a hearty and flavorful dish
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad

items.name: Perpuvada
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made from soaked and ground lentils mixed with spices, shaped into small patties, and deep-fried until crispy. (4 vada)

items.name: Ven Pongal
items.description: A savory and comforting South Indian breakfast dish made with rice, moong dal (lentil), and ghee

items.name: Aviyal
items.description: A comforting dish from Kerala. Mix veggies cooked in coconut and yogurt based thick gravy tempered with spices and fresh curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Chicken Mapas
items.description: A creamy, spiced curry from South India, where chicken is cooked in a rich sauce made with coconut, yogurt, and aromatic spices. This dish features a balance of heat and mildness, creating a flavorful and comforting meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad

items.name: Unniappam
items.description: A traditional South Indian snack originating from Kerala, made from a batter consisting of rice flour, jaggery (unrefined cane sugar), ripe bananas, coconut pieces, roasted sesame seeds, and cardamom powder. This batter is then poured into special molds and fried until golden brown, resulting in sweet, spongy, and flavorful dumplings. (7 appams)

items.name: Puli Sadam
items.description: A tangy South Indian rice dish, featuring cooked rice mixed with a spicy tamarind paste infused with aromatic spices, creating a burst of flavors in every mouthful, perfect for a satisfying meal

items.name: Veg Biryani
items.description: Assorted veggies slow cooked with aromatic basmati rice and spices topped with fried onions served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Achari Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish where tender chicken is marinated in tangy pickling spices and layered with fragrant basmati rice. Cooked together, in a unique blend of spicy and tangy flavors, making for a hearty and satisfying meal. Served with raita+ papad

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Masala Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander
